mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party(party_name, created_by, created_at) VALUES (#{partyName}, #{createdBy}, SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE party SET party_name = #{partyName}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_at = SYSDATE() WHERE party_id = #{partyId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM party_member pm INNER JOIN party p ON p.party_id = pm.party_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = pm.user_id WHERE p.party_id = #{partyId}
